data.text: @zechts @berniemoreno And so, back to my original point.
@TMJM114 @berniemoreno i dont really care as that is irrelevant to banning foreigners from buying land/houses in the USA.

@zechts @berniemoreno Do you think that finding two counter-examples disproves my point? Foreigners can buy land in the UK, most of the EU, Costa Rica, Canada, and most of South America. That’s a large chunk of the world.
@berniemoreno This can wait. Get the save act passed now!

@berniemoreno https://t.co/o1FBtVYEl5 Things not looking good for you PEDO BERNIE MORENO!

#Resign
@TMJM114 @berniemoreno foreigners cant own land in china or mexico you get leases only if allowed

@zechts @berniemoreno In that case, shouldn’t US citizens be barred from buying residences outside the US? Fair’s fair. 

Let’s see how much support you get from the billionaire class for that.
